summary: I am a backend java developer. I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to develop myself and improve the project I'm working on. My greatest interest is backend development however I do not shy away from new challenges. That is why as a sideproject I learn frontend technolgies to become a fullstack dev (node, react, js, etc.).
headline: Java Developer at EPAM Systems

educations.schoolName: Państwowa Wyższa Szkoła Techniczno-Ekonomiczna im. ks. Bronisława Markiewicza w Jarosławiu
Państwowa Wyższa Szkoła Techniczno-Ekonomiczna im. ks. Bronisława Markiewicza w Jarosławiu

position.title: Java Developer
position.description:
- development of new features for several components
- refactoring of the application and proposing new features
- participation in refinement of the requirements
- training of a new joiner and preparation for introducing him into the project
- leading the migration to docker and spring boot of some of the older components
- ownership of a component (managing creation of the spring service from scratch, updating, refactoring, deployment to production and support)
- supporting and improving the stability of the project environment
- developing application programming interface specification in open application programming interface specification
- creating deployment scripts for open application programming interface
- testing and refactoring the application
- managing updates of resource bundles for Frontend part of the application

position.title: .NET Developer
position.description:
- implementing new features
- fixing bugs
- code refactoring
- performed manual and functional testing
- creating graphical user interface layout concept
- integrating middleware part of the application with graphical user interface
- creating code generator for generating code for the  middleware part of the application that was being implemented
- supporting application
- profiling application performance

position.title: Junior Java Developer
position.description:
•	Development of new models, services and REST controllers.
•	Implementing repositories based on Spring-Data and MongoDB.
•	Implementation of business logic.
•	Writing and performing unit tests with JUnit, Mockito and Fongo.
•	Application profiling.
•	Environment configuration.
•	Heavy code refactoring.
•	Participation in Scrum sprint plannings, daily’s and retrospectives as team member.
•	Product demonstration.
•	Code reviewing.
•	Pair programming.

position.title: Junior .NET Developer
position.description:
•	Creating and testing addins to Autodesk Revit in C# in Visual Studio according to project specification within Graitec Power Pack for Revit Project.
•	Constant work with Revit API documentation in English
•	Practical use of TFS
•	Creating interfaces with MVVM design pattern in WPF
•	Code analysis and fixing bugs
•	Analysis and creative problem solving
•	Communication and cooperation with international team of programmers

position.title: Senior Java Developer
position.description:
ENG:

SALESmanago is the only no-code, AI driven CDXP (all in One Customer Data Platform & Customer Experience Platform) used by 2000+ midmarket and large Enterprises in 50 countries including Starbucks, Vodafone, Lacoste, New Balance, Victoria’s Secret and many other global brands. Financial Times ranks SALESmanago as the fastest growing marketing automation platform in Europe.

SALESmanago is harnessing the full power of first- and zero-party data, combining advanced analytics and AI Hyperpersonalization to deliver highly configurable personalised experiences, across a comprehensive range of natively built and integrated marketing execution channels.

The company is based in Kraków, Poland and employs 300 highly experienced consultants, data scientists and engineers. SALESmanago works internationally via an extensive network of over 1000 reselling partners.

Get started with SALESmanago with 2 month free Proof of Concept. Register at www.salesmanago.com

PL:

SALESmanago to jedyna platforma CDXP (all-in-one Customer Data Platform & Customer Experience Platform) wspierana sztuczną inteligencją i wykorzystująca podejście no-code. Wykorzystywana jest przez ponad 2000 klientów (m.in. Starbucks, Vodafone, Lacoste, New Balance, Victoria’s Secret) w 50 krajach. Financial Times określił SALESmanago jako najszybciej rosnącą platformę marketing automation w Europie. 

SALESmanago wykorzystuje pełen potencjał danych o klientach, łącząc zaawansowaną analitykę i hiperpersonalizację do dostarczenia w pełni konfigurowalnych, spersonalizowanych doświadczeń we wszystkich kanałach marketingowych. 

Firma zlokalizowana jest w Krakowie i zatrudnia 300 doświadczonych konsultantów, data scientists i inżynierów. SALESmanago działa międzynarodowo dzięki szerokiej sieci ponad 1000 partnerów biznesowych.

Zacznij swoją podróż z SALESmanago od 2-miesięcznego darmowego Proof of Concept. Zarejestruj się na www.salesmanago.pl
